lead_paragraph: Pakistan has delayed the delivery of a U.N. report on the assassination of the former prime minister Benazir Bhutto to allow time for input on warnings Ms. Bhutto got from three countries.
snippet: Pakistan has delayed the delivery of a U.N. report on the assassination of the former prime minister Benazir Bhutto to allow time for input on warnings Ms. Bhutto got from three countries.

headline.main: Pakistan: Delay in a Report on Bhutto
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Delay In a Report On Bhutto
